flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=9>>9 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+4 = <<4+9=13>>13 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+9+13 = <<9+9+13=31>>31 fruits
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
